description: Stores information about a student's attendance.

fields.description: The time a tardy student arrived.
fields.inlineHelpText: For tardy events, the time when the student arrived.
fields.label: Arrival Time

fields.description: Indicate whether this tardy or absence was for one class period or for the day.
fields.inlineHelpText: The type of tardy or absence.
fields.label: Attendance Type

fields.description: The student who's tardy or absent.
fields.inlineHelpText: The student who is either tardy or absent.
fields.label: Contact

fields.description: The class and period in which the student was tardy or absent.
fields.inlineHelpText: The class and period in which the student was either tardy or absent.
fields.label: Course Connection

fields.description: The name of the Course in which the student was tardy or absent (read-only).
fields.inlineHelpText: The name of the Course for which the student was either tardy or absent.
fields.label: Course Name

fields.description: The date of the tardy or absence.
fields.inlineHelpText: The date when the tardy or absence occurred.
fields.label: Date

fields.description: For a partial-day excused absence, the time the student returned.
fields.inlineHelpText: For excused absences, the time the absence ends.
fields.label: End Time

fields.description: More details about the student's absence or tardiness.
fields.inlineHelpText: A description of the reason the student was either tardy or absent.
fields.label: Reason Description

fields.description: Select an option that most closely matches the reason the student was absent or tardy. Use the Reason Description field to enter more details.
fields.inlineHelpText: The reason the student was either tardy or absent.
fields.label: Reason

fields.description: For a partial-day excused absence, the time the student left school.
fields.inlineHelpText: For excused absences, the time the absence starts.
fields.label: Start Time

fields.description: Indicates an unexcused tardy or absence.
fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates an unexcused tardy or absence.
fields.label: Unexcused

label: Attendance Event
